name: Neon Shooter (itch)
description:
Neon Shooter is an exciting shooting game, that takes place in a distant future in a dystopian downtown, where the government suppress the people with armed robots. The main character is a cyborg called Bob. He works for one of the military suppliers to an upgrade module robot, but he has his own agenda, he wants to destroy the military regime. His goal is to get to the robot factory in the end of the street, and to defeat the factory leaders and destroy the production line. This will weaken the military market and therefore weaken the government, to spark a revolution among the people. 

To beat the enemies you have to use guns with two different colors. If you hit an enemy with the wrong color, the enemy gets a power-up. The color mechanism is important to learn during the game, to be able to win.
